org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss
Interface GssEnabledResource

All Superinterfaces:
Resource
All Known Subinterfaces:
GssConnectionResource, HttpgServiceResource
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseGssConnectionResource, BaseGssServiceResource, BaseHttpgServiceResource
public interface GssEnabledResource
extends Resource

Describes a service resource to which gss secured connections can be made.

Method Detail

authenticates

public void authenticates(org.ietf.jgss.GSSCredential credential)
                   throws org.ietf.jgss.GSSException,
                          ResourceException
Tests whether the given credential successfully authenticates to this service resource. Throws exception if authentication fails. If no exception is thrown, we assume the credential succesfully authenticated a user to the service.

Parameters:
credential - The credential
Throws:
org.ietf.jgss.GSSException
ResourceException
